page.title: 18VILLAGE LIFE FINSTOCK - II
page.content: The most popular {leisure activity }in the {44} households surveyed was {gar- {dening }followed by {tennis }and { {walking. Handicrafts }included knit- ting, needlework, DIY and cooking. { {Outdoor Sports:} riding, football, golf, cricket, shooting, fishing, jog- ging, boating, bicycling and a few for morris dancing, flying, windsurfing, bowls, motocross and showing dogs.{ {Indoor Sports: }badminton, swimming, snooker, squash. {Other minority {interests:}foreign travel, reading and crosswords, modelling planes, local history, music and community work.{ {Pets }kept included horses, rabbits, cage birds, hamsters, guinea pigs, goats, tortoises, tropical fish. Only 16 households had no pets, 19 kept { {dogs} and l5 {cats.
